CustomField.formula:
CASE( Applicant_Information__r.ROOFPRO_Portal_Language__c,
"English", CASE(Present_Tier_Lookup__r.Name, "Tier 1", "ROOFPRO Preferred", "Tier 2", "ROOFPRO Select", "Tier 3", "ROOFPRO Craftsman Premier", "Tier 0", "Advantage",
"No Tier Chosen"),
"Quebec French", CASE(Present_Tier_Lookup__r.Name, "Tier 1", "ROOFPRO Privilège", "Tier 2", "ROOFPRO Sélect", "Tier 3", "ROOFPRO Maître Artisan", "Tier 0", "Avantage", "No Tier Chosen"),
"No Tier Chosen")
CustomField.label: Tier
